TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Qngqaya_djiyun_Truku_kdjiyax, title = Qngqaya_djiyun_Truku_kdjiyax, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Qngqaya_djiyun_Truku_kdjiyax} }

S.FORM: Qngqaya djiyun Truku kdjiyax Qngaya djiyun kndsan Truku sbiyaw o niqan 4 keelgan djiyu. qngqaya mahan pratu mahan (tutu djima sun uri) djiyun mimah sinaw wihi (snalu qhuni) djiyun mimah bgu damat. kayu (snalu qhuni) psaan bgu mtalux hahaw (sahaw sun uri,snalu snkaan rudan hiyi sangi) djiyun smahug qsiya. qngqaya tmsamat Buji (snalu skuy aji uri o djima) djiyun smbu samat Reesug (snalu skuy aji uri o djima) djiyun smbu samat Bhniq (snalu dha qhuni) djiyun smbu samat Smbrangan (snalu qhuni) djiyun smbu samat Qlubung (gasil nuqih , qhuni ni quwarux) djiyun ptjiylan samat. Aga (snalu djima) djiyun smbu rapit ni qbhni. qngqaya paan Towkan (tnunan waray nuqih) djiyun paan samat aji uri o paan qngqaya tmsamat Takil (tunan waray nuqih) djiyun paan samat aji uri psaan tunux pais Brunguy (tunan quwarux) djiyun mmiyak kuyuh Truku Paga(snalu qhuni) djiyun paan mdngu rpiq qhuniaji uri. Towkan rqling (tnunan waray nuqih) paan risaw Truku Brunguy rqling (tnunan quwarux paan wauwa Truku Wahug (tnunan waray nuqih aji uri o quwarux) jiyun paan towkan aji uri o brunguy. qngqaya uqan Taku (snalu tpaqan samat , pusu djima ni qhuni) sahug idaw. Isux (snalu tpaqan samat , pusu djima ni qhuni) jiyun misux gmuwang idaw masu Gupuq (snalu uraw) psaan idaw hjiyuun musa qmpahan Wihi (snalu qhuni) sahug bgu damat qngqaya mhapuy Kulu luan (snalu qhuni) psluun muwax dhquy ptulan. qngqaya qeepah Parih (snalu sida qhuni) jiyun kmari bunga ni pshnuk dxgal. Suqu (snalu qhuni) jiyun pshuk dxgal tntakan Btug (snalu djima aji uri o skuy) jiyun kmtuy masu. qngqaya tmikan Duhun (snalu qhuni) jiyun tmikan masu, sqmu, basaw, Sru (snalu qhuni) jiyun tmikan Qaya cinun(snalu qhuni ni djima) jiyun mseusa(tminun qabang) qngqaya lubug Tatuk (snalu qhuni) lubug tmatuk Lubug qawqaw (snalu djima) lubug psaun pdahung Mgagu (snalu djima) lubug miyuk Lubug qnawal (snalu qhuni an qnawal rqling)lubug qnawal pshnang qngqaya tninun Brunguy (snalu uraw) djiyun mapa Bgiya (snalu uraw) djiyun tmbus Gupuq (snalu quwarux) psaan uqun Plian (snalu uraw) psaan lukus Bahu psaan lukus(snalu ruaw) Sisi (snalu quwarux)jiyun qmp pnyahan kari : Yudaw Pisaw, Iyang Taying. 2004
